encodedQuestion().details: Encoded question parameters, needed to create and reopen a question.

parentMarket().details: The parent proposal (optional). This proposal redeems to an outcome token of the parent proposal.

parentOutcome().details: The parent outcome (optional). The parent proposal's outcome token this proposal redeems for.

parentWrappedOutcome().details: Returns the wrapped1155 and the data corresponding to the parent proposal.

resolve().details: Helper function to resolve the proposal.

wrappedOutcome(uint256).details: Returns the wrapped1155 and the data corresponding to an outcome token.

initialized.details: Flag to initialize the proposal only once.
